resources.string: Enables the permanent notification in the status bar to change profiles quickly.
Enables root access, which allows additional settings.
Install SwiP as system-app, which will allow the app to use methods that should work on every device (for certain settings) and adds new functionality.\n[Needs Root]
Please understand that this will prevent the app from being uninstalled, make sure to get back to these settings to make it uninstallable again.
Removes SwiP as system-app, so it can be uninstalled again
Uninstalling the app as system-app will make it uninstallable again, however you will not be able to use all settings.
Please restart your phone for the changes to take effect.
Please check if your device is rooted and you have a superuser app installed!
